name: Neon Sequence
description:
Neon Sequence

----=[ ]=----

Slide around through puzzles to find the correct colored sequence

Obtain the 3 orbs to 100% a level

--=--

Controls

WASD - Move

R - Reset Level

M - Open / Close Menu
